info.title: WiiConnect
info.author: JSMaster
info.details: WiiConnect is a tool to connect Wii users to eachother, without the hassle of Nintendo's "safe" crap. It will eventually be able to do many things (hopefully). This release is just a demo. It may not work for everyone. Please post evaluations at www.wiibrew.org/wiki/User_talk:Jsmaster/wiiconnect
